title: Time Ryder
description: Time Ryder and the Chrono Teens are protecting our future and preserving the past. If you mess with the timeline you better watch your back!
quote: You can achieve incredible things and the greatest power in the universe is right between your ears.
creator: Wally Nash
altHero: Time Ryder and the Chrono Teens
alt1: Time Ryder and a villain in a purple light jail
